attributes.action: Abandon Proposals Instigating Continuous Insurance For Motor Vehicles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We understand that the UK Government are proposing to instigate 'continuous insurance' for motor vehicles. This idea would be in detriment to the owners and collectors of 'historic vehicles', motor museums, the motor trade, farm vehicles and vehicles laid up for major restoration work, etc etc. WHY????? We the undersigned urge the UK government to abandon these proposals.
